item.title: Free software for screen video capture
item.description: CamStudio 2.7 http://camstudio.org/ works fine Rylstim-Screen-Recorder http://www.sketchman-studio.com/rylstim-screen-recorder/ There were some troubles while recording ConEmu software Portable version is available HyperCam 2 http://www.hyperionics.com/hc/ Works well
